description.ko: 빛의 물리학을 시각적으로 탐구하여, 백색광이 크리스털 프리즘을 통과하며 선명한 무지개 빛깔로 분산되는 찰나의 순간을 담았습니다.
description.en: A stunning visual exploration of light physics, capturing the moment white light splits into a vibrant spectrum through a crystal prism.

prompt: Hyper-realistic macro photography of a clear triangular glass prism resting on a sleek white surface. A sharp beam of white light enters the prism and disperses into a vivid, glowing rainbow spectrum across the frame. Chromatic aberration, caustic light patterns, soft ethereal atmosphere, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, minimalist aesthetic.
